snippet: Six workers at the Fukushima nuclear plant were sprayed with highly radioactive water after they accidentally disconnected a pipe in the reactors’ makeshift cooling system, the plant’s operator said.
abstract: Tokyo Electric Power Company reports that six workers at the Fukushima nuclear plant were sprayed with highly radioactive water after they accidentally disconnected a pipe in the reactors’ makeshift cooling system.
lead_paragraph: Six workers at the Fukushima nuclear plant were sprayed with highly radioactive water after they accidentally disconnected a pipe in the reactors’ makeshift cooling system, the plant’s operator said.

headline.main: Japan: Workers Doused With Radioactive Water
headline.print_headline: Japan: Workers Doused With Radioactive Water
